post:
Hi,

I posted this a few months ago, but the person that bought it has dropped out (quite rightly, as they could do so). I realise the specs aren't great but it's in a great datacenter.

It's an [i3-2100](http://cpubenchmark.net/cpu.php?cpu=Intel+Core+i3-2100+%40+3.10GHz&id=749), 4GB RAM, 500GB HDD Dell server, practically brand new. It's £400 new and is literally brand new and has only been co-lo'd for a week or so and that's when the box was opened.

If anybody is interested, please post here and I'll drop you a PM with more details. The colocation is in a 12 month contract so that would have to be transferred over to the buyer. The contract was initiated in July of this year. It's in a Tier 3 DC with the cheapest co-lo prices I've seen. The network it's on is fantastic.

Buyer would rent server from me until colo contract is up.

Thank you.
